ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Bernie Wrightson,Sid Greene,Berni Wrightson,Pat Boyette,Stanley Pitt,Sid Greene
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Sole Survivor!: Captain Dandrigde recklessly sails his ship into a storm, killing his crew and stranding himself on a deserted island.
A Guy Can Die Laughing!: Alfie is a clown who can't make the crowd laugh. He then finds a magical jester costumer that might be the answer to his problem.
The Computer Game: A computer has the ability to generate life-like illusions and wants to take over the world.
My! How Small You've Grown!: Two explorers in Africa run into a tribe of headhunters.
ComicInfo.Title: The Sole Survivor!; A Guy Can Die Laughing!; The Computer Game; My! How Small You've Grown!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
